actions.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A065) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Schweikert to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Schweikert to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A065) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to create a pilot program for reduction of department-owned vehicles and increase in use of ride-sharing services.
purpose: An amendment No. 24 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to create a pilot program for reduction of department-owned vehicles and increase in use of ride-sharing services.
